New Records: Shubman Gill scored a record-breaking ton.
India registered the biggest win margin in T20I history with a 168-run victory.
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill was named Player of the Match for his excellent century.
Hardik Pandya delivered a magical spell contributing significantly to the win.
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya downplayed his influence and credited the support staff for the team's performance.
Pandya was named Player of the Series for his all-round efforts.
